b18166a2-6c34-431b-b959-37a505639314.description: Individuals earning this badge are or have been a core team member of a special Early Availability project to use the Audrey™ app to create brain-aligned messages which were presented either to customers or within the badge earner’s organization. Audrey is a tool developed by Oratium that helps sales reps and executives to efficiently build high-quality, brain-aligned messages using the Oratium Method.
b18166a2-6c34-431b-b959-37a505639314.name: Audrey Early Availability Trailblazer

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the individual must successfully complete several steps to demonstrate proficiency in the Oratium Method and the Audrey app. First, the badge recipient must be selected to join a special project to test Audrey.
The individual must then complete training in the Oratium Method and the Audrey tool to create brain-aligned, retellable messages that will be used internally or with customers.
Once their training is complete, the badge recipient must successfully create brain-aligned messages using Audrey and the Oratium Method.
Finally, the recipient has successfully presented their brain-aligned messages to their customers and/or colleagues.
